alert.note: Alert for Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 11:16PM CDT until June 12 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SUNFLOWER...EASTERN WASHINGTON AND NORTHWESTERN HUMPHREYS COUNTIES... At 1116 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Arcola, or 7 miles north of Hollandale, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hollandale and Darlove around 1125 PM CDT. Murphy around 1140 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
